#HiImTom

 

 Hi, I'm Tom! I'm an LA-based singer-songwriter who loves recording my songs, making music videos, and playing live. I also score films, have a side band, make goofy travel videos, and do other silly and serious things. Over the past ten years, I've been lucky to go to a lot of fun places and meet a lot of cool people. Maybe you're one of them, or will be someday. Thanks for checking out my website. I hope you like it!
